title: Jana Gana Mana Song Lyrics Aayitha Ezhuthu
stanzas:
Jana Gana Mana Song Lyrics Aayitha Ezhuthu
oh yuva yuva
oh yuva yuva

jana gana mana
jananngalai ninai
kanavugal vella
kaariyam thunai

oliye vazhiyaaga
malaiye padiyaaga
pagaiyo podiyaaga
chuck chuck chuck
gum sei

jana gana mana
janangalai ninai
kanavugal vella
kaariyam thunai

ini oru ini oru
vidhi seivom
oh yuva yuva
oh yuva yuva

vidhiyinai maatrum
vidhi seivom
oh yuva yuva
oh yuva yuva

jana gana mana
janangalai ninai
kanavugal vella
kaariyam thunai

oliye vazhiyaaga
malaiye padiyaaga
pagaiyo podiyaaga
chuck chuck chuck
gum sei

aayudham edu
aaramum sudu
theepandham edu
theemaiyai sudu
irulai eriththu vidu

eazhaikkum vaazhvukku
irukindra idaiveli
kuraiththu, nilai niruthu
ada kottathil vittathai
sattathil mattathai udaiththu

kaatrukkul nulaigindra
kaatredhuvum
kaalani edhuvum
anivadhillai
aayiram ilaignargal
thunindhuvittal
aayutham edhuvum
thevaiyillai

oh yuva oh yuva
oh yuva

jana gana mana
janangalai ninai
kanavugal vella
kaariyam thunai

achathai vidu latchiyam thodu
vetrumai vidu vetriyai thodu
thozha poraadu

malaigalil nulaigindra nadhiyena
suyavazhi amaithu padai nadaththu
ada vetrikku pakkaththi mutrathil
sutrathai niruththu

nallavar yaavaraum
odhungikondaal
narigalin naataamai
thodangividum
vaaliba koottani vaaleduthal
valappakkam boomi
thirumbividum

oh yuva oh yuva
oh yuva

jana gana mana
janangalai ninai
kanavugal vella
kaariyam thunai

oliye vazhiyaaga
malaiye padiyaaga
pagaiyo podiyaaga

gum sei

seo.title: Jana Gana Mana Song Lyrics Aayitha Ezhuthu
seo.description: Get the complete Jana Gana Mana Song Lyrics Aayitha Ezhuthu from Aayitha Ezhuthu. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Aayitha Ezhuthu, AR Rahman, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
